RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 7700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE DREAM warded off challenger. LZ KING OF THE KINGS pressed, clear second. BROOKES BRIONI chased speedy duo. ROMEO SIERRA inside, no rally. DEEP DIAMOND TM shuffled back, wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Brookes Brioni
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Brian Dean Scott and Velasco Lynda Erica

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 220 Y Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 8000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 24, 2022. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TM I SEE A PATRIOT fired first step. JJ WILL U B MINE solid return, outdueled. KAIOKEN CARTEL bold bid, denied. LT SNICKERS danced in gate. WAVING CHICK couldnt match.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 220 Y Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 8400. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CURTEL exploded at break. FLAME OF THE YUKON broke inward, second best. SOUTH HENRY STREAK second flight duel. JUST PLAIN DEADLY finished full of run. STREAKIN FIVE BAR off slow, good finish. BOSSY BUX mild menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Streakin Five Bar
ENTRY.OWNER: Renfro Keith Renfro Kyla and Harper Farms

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 300 Y Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 6000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPICY SAWYER left them in dust. SHESA BOLD MVP pinched, fought back. JMG SPECIAL CAPO brushed, mid pack duel. PECOS RIVER QUEEN bumped, empty. JJS DASHIN BOSTON no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 330 Y Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 7500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARTREUSE BLUE despite early bumps. FDD LADY PATRIOT weaved midway. JRS MAJESTIC PRINCE good bid, not enough. TIPPY THE TRAIN sharp break, faded. EKG IM DASHING no excuses outside. JESSAGREATGRANDSON urged, empty. JRS MAJESTIC MATTEO bumped, no recovery. I GOT FIRERY off slow, head high.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AJS FAST CORONA urged, strong response. FLASHY BP broke out, late gain. GIANNIRUSSO best stride late. DASHIN MOONIE lost path late. MS TURQUOISE mid pack duel. BO TRAIN unable to sustain bid.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 250 Y Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JJ LUCKY JESS drifted, speedy. XF AJS HERO winner too tough. KISS ME SALLY bobbled break, fought on. THROW THE HEAT mild late gain. RB LACYS DYNASTY onepaced. FAVORITE FIRST LADY lacked experience.
